snippet: The tax return showed that President Obama, who in 2008 and 2009 received $8.1 million from his two autobiographies, last year earned most of his money from being commander in chief.
abstract: White House officials report highlights of federal tax return filed by Pres Obama and his wife Michelle for their 2014 earnings.
lead_paragraph: The tax return showed that President Obama, who in 2008 and 2009 received $8.1 million from his two autobiographies, last year earned most of his money from being commander in chief.

headline.main: Obamas’ Tax Return Shows Most Income Is From Salary
headline.print_headline: Obamas’ Tax Return Shows Most Income Is From Salary
